en-US.summary: A quiz to test your knowledge about astronomy, space exploration and our Solar System
en-US.name: Space quiz
en-US.description:
Test your knowledge about Space with this fun quiz!

You will receive several questions about astronomy, space exploration and our Solar System. Answer with the number of the right answer and try to get as many right answers as possible.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Start the skill with the invocation
Alexa, start Space Quiz.

Then after each question, tell the number of the answer you think it's right, among the proposed ones.

The user can ask the skill to repeat the last question.
